title: integration print_stages returns zeroes fo Polygon Mumbai node
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2.47.0-stable-5536d645`

OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash: 5536d645942aca88b893a5cb1c9aaf16c8e66ee5

Erigon Command (with flags/config):erigon node was started with command `/erigon --chain=mumbai --datadir=~/chains/mumbai --prune=htc --bor.heimdall=https://heimdall-api-testnet.polygon.technology/
`, integration - with command `./integration print_stages --chain=mumbai --datadir=~/chains/mumbai`

Chain/Network: Polygon Mumbai 

#### Expected behaviour
Erigon node is fully synced,  so print_stages should show some meaningful info.

#### Actual behaviour
print_stages returns zeroes only:
```
dev@erigon:~/src/erigon/build/bin$ ./integration print_stages --chain=mumbai --datadir=~/chains/mumbai
INFO[06-28|18:45:31.494] logging to file system                   log dir=~/chains/mumbai/logs file prefix=integration log level=info json=false
Note: prune_at doesn't mean 'all data before were deleted' - it just mean stage.Prune function were run to this block. Because 1 stage may prune multiple data types to different prune distance.

                                 stage_at        prune_at
Snapshots                        0               0
Headers                          1               0
BlockHashes                      0               0
Bodies                           1               0
Senders                          0               0
Execution                        0               0
Translation                      0               0
HashState                        0               0
IntermediateHashes               0               0
AccountHistoryIndex              0               0
StorageHistoryIndex              0               0
LogIndex                         0               0
CallTraces                       0               0
TxLookup                         0               0
Finish                           0               0
--
prune distance: 

blocks.v2: blocks=0, segments=0, indices=0

history.v3: false,  idx steps: 0.00, lastMaxTxNum=0->0, lastBlockInSnap=0

sequence: EthTx=0, NonCanonicalTx=0

in db: first header 0, last header 0, first body 0, last body 0
--
```
This issue is reproduced on several other Mumbai nodes.

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Node was synced from scratch with 2.46.0 version, this behaviour was reproduced for this version too,  after that I have updated version to v2.47.0,  it doesn't help.

The issue was related to using `~` for substitution of home dir path in `--datadir` setting. It is interpreted correctly for `erigon`,  but `integration` tries to use local folder with `~` name. Explicit home dir path can be used as workaround for this issue
